com.panasonic.toughpad.android.api

Class ToughpadApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.panasonic.toughpad.android.api.ToughpadApi

  • public class ToughpadApi
extends java.lang.Object
    The ToughpadApi class must be used to initialize and destroy the Toughpad API before any of the methods can be used.

    The initialize method is used to initialize the API.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void destroy()
      Destroys any resources associated with the Toughpad API.
      static int getClientVersion()
      Determine the client API version.
      static int getServerVersion()
      Determine the server API version.
      static IToughpadApi getToughpadApi()
      Acquire the IToughpadApi object (internal use only).
      static void initialize(android.content.Context context, ToughpadApiListener listener)
      Initialize Toughpad API for use.
      static boolean isAlreadyInitialized()
      Determine if the API has been successfully initialized.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                              ToughpadApiListener listener)
        Initialize Toughpad API for use. No Toughpad API methods can be used until this method is called.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use for connecting with Toughpad API
        listener - The listener to receive the event when Toughpad API has been initialized.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of the parameters are null.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If Toughpad API is already in the process of initialization or it has been already initialized.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If Toughpad API is not available on this device or if the Toughpad API service has not been installed.

      • isAlreadyInitialized

        public static boolean isAlreadyInitialized()
        Determine if the API has been successfully initialized.
        Returns:
        True if the API has been initialized, false otherwise.

      • getClientVersion

        public static int getClientVersion()
        Determine the client API version.
        Returns:
        The API version for the Toughpad.jar library to which this application is linked against.

      • getServerVersion

        public static int getServerVersion()
        Determine the server API version.
        Returns:
        The API version of the service to which this application is is connected to.

      • destroy

        public static void destroy()
        Destroys any resources associated with the Toughpad API.

        The application should invoke this method when no Toughpad API methods will be used. Toughpad API can be re-initialized again with the initialize(android.content.Context, com.panasonic.toughpad.android.api.ToughpadApiListener) method.

      • getToughpadApi

        public static IToughpadApi getToughpadApi()
        Acquire the IToughpadApi object (internal use only).
